articles.author: Jamie Barton
articles.title: Pascal Siakam propels Indiana Pacers to 2-0 lead over New York Knicks in Eastern Conference finals - CNN
articles.description: Pascal Siakam exploded for 39 points as the Indiana Pacers beat the New York Knicks 114-109 on Friday night to open up a 2-0 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
articles.content:
Pascal Siakam exploded for 39 points as the Indiana Pacers beat the New York Knicks 114-109 on Friday night to open up a 2-0 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
